Gradient

\( \nabla \) is nabla Greek letter that can be used as gradient symbol.

\( grad f = \nabla f \)

Let \( f(x_1, â€¦ x_n) \) exists and differentiable. \( \nabla f \) is vector of \(n\) partial derivatives of \( f \)

Gradient descent

Let \( a^{n+1} = a^n - \gamma\nabla f(a^n) \)

then \( f(a^n) \ge f(a^{n + 1}) \)

TODO: define \( \gamma \)
